lead_paragraph: A thrashing at the hands of Australia had been a salutary lesson for New Zealand captain Kane Williamson and his side would be far more aggressive when their one-day series starts against a confident Bangladesh team on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Shell-Shocked New Zealand to Be Aggressive Against Bangladesh
headline.main: Shell-Shocked New Zealand to Be Aggressive Against Bangladesh

snippet: A thrashing at the hands of Australia had been a salutary lesson for New Zealand captain Kane Williamson and his side would be far more aggressive when their one-day series starts against a confident Bangladesh team on Monday....
